translation: Whatever being there is glorious, prosperous, or powerful, know that to be a manifestation of a part of My splendor.
commentary: 10.41 Yat Yat whatever? Vibhutimat glorious? Sattvam being? Mr. prosperous? Energetic powerful? Eve also? or or? That that that that? Eve only? Understand know? You thou? My My? Tejon'shasambhavam a manifestation of a part of My splendour.No Commentary.
